alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Panola (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:24PM CDT until June 11 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... Southern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Curtis Station, or 8 miles west of Batesville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Batesville, Pope, Curtis Station, Courtland, Locke Station, Shuford, Mims, Asa, Eureka Springs, Chapeltown and Ballentine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
